items.title: New limits on school loans could narrow physician and nurse pipeline, educators warn
items.description: Under new Trump administration rules, students won't be able to borrow as much for medical or nursing school or some other health professions.

items.title: A bowhead whale's DNA offers clues to fight cancer
items.description: Scientists searching for new ways to combat cancer think they may have uncovered a promising new lead in the DNA of the bowhead whale.
